website_summaries.verdict: Norton AntiVirus 2009 hits all the right security notes, and its superior protection technologies might even win back some jaded anti-Symantec folks, though for some, technical support may continue to frustrate.
pros: Norton AntiVirus 2009 has a leaner footprint, improved speed, white listing, and other technologies to mark clean files as trusted, and free technical support
cons: Despite its free telephone support, Norton AntiVirus 2009 lacks adequate online technical support and, intentional or not, it drives users to its paid technical support services

customer_reviews.title: No More Aggravation
customer_reviews.text: I had tried Norton with a former machine that ran Windows 98 and it always seemed it caused Windows to crash, so I switched to McAfee. Then they started forcing aggravating pop-ups that could not be turned off and that had to be clicked on to make them go away. So I switched back to Norton. I now run XP and have no problems. Norton does it's thing without muss/fuss/aggravation. About once a week I get a pop-up letting me know that it's running. That's it. I am Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Radio Writer

customer_reviews.title: Good paid antivirus, but doesn't offer anything over the free ones.
customer_reviews.text: Good antivirus. Lasted me a long time. I used Norton for quite a few years before I got tired of having to purchase it every year. Then I found some really great, if not better, free antiviruses and never went back to paid ones again. Norton would surely be my first choice for paid antivirus, however.
customer_reviews.author: Diab

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from Norton Antivirus 2004 and I really like this product. The interface is different from the previous version. I have not noticed any speed overhead, it works while the computer is idle and has a lot of easy to configure features. Amazon had a good price which made this a great value. I recommend this product for those looking for good antivirus software.
customer_reviews.author: Copykat

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Norton works for me. Some people say it slows the computer down, but I have never noticed any problems. Knock wood, Norton has kept my old desktop safe for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Solzhenitsyn

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this antivirus at all. My computer was safe, and of course, that made me feel good. Not a bad choice for an affordable option with so many now on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Marva Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It can't help if it won't download
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I tried it will not load into either of my family laptops. We will not be trying this software again.
customer_reviews.author: TriCruiser2000

customer_reviews.title: dgfg
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for someone else, I guess they liked it as they use it, not sure what else you would like of my opinion on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Norton 2009 Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Very Good!. But careful. They include a "free" performance checkup on your Pc, and you know what it is? It is another virus and spyware checkup but you have to buy the PC performance improvement part.
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: yea
customer_reviews.text: whats to say...its norton. I guess it does its job, it makes me feel better and more protected. Who knows if it really helps though
customer_reviews.author: Amy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-  Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only protection I will install on my computer anymore. I used to use "the other guys" and found that my computer would get infected more... With all the problems out there, you are bound to get something sooner than later, but I'd rather have a little piece of mind at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Behrens II

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Always a dependable product, runs in the background and doesnt slow my computer down. I will purchase again when my subscription expires
customer_reviews.author: New Horizons

customer_reviews.title: Norton is back
customer_reviews.text: The installation went very smoothly, updated without a hitch. Very happy to see Norton doing it "right" once again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Software
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Norton Antivirus software to use for any home/office computer. I would recommend it to others...Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: GBP

customer_reviews.title: Norton 2009
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. I bought a total of five single licenses and installed on various XP and Vista based machines. All installed fast and without incident. This years version is definitely less resource demanding than previous Norton AV products. I have not had evidence of spyware, malware or virus in four years of using Symantec products. We benchmarked a machine that my kids use for surfing with free versions of AVS, Kapersky and Spybot. If this machine was infected, none of these programs identified them. I trust NORTON 2009 will perform as well as earlier versions.
customer_reviews.author: big daddy

customer_reviews.title: Norton Anti Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: This is Nortons least expensive version...works great. Delivery was good; better than paying big bucks for an anti virus program!
customer_reviews.author: Red Fenders

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product that costs over twice as much from Norton and it does the exact same job! This is the 2nd time I have purchased this and I'm certain that I will buy it again when the current version expires.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Norton is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Norton is the best antivirus I ever had or ever will have to protect my computer and scan and clean it up I recomend it to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Dark Child Of The Night

customer_reviews.title: Elizabeth
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other AV programs - Panda, Kaspersky, and several others. Norton AV 2009 is a very big improvement over the others. No installation problems, and very fast definition updates. This program removed trojans from a site that I trusted. I am very happy with this program, and I plan on using it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Yes it did install - OK.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it did install - OK. That's the only reason it got 2 stars not one. Mine main system was working fine until Norton AV 2009 (I have not used Norton software since the 90's.) I thought I'll try it again for the first time. Probs. after probs., I am going to reinstall my system again MINUS Norton AV 2009 and reinstall AVV and we will see if it's the software or the hard drive... BUT I'm thinking it Norton AV 2009 is the prob. I have another partition with Ubuntu/Linux .. Yes I know why are you using Windows XP pro? Because of 90% of all software is written for Windows.
customer_reviews.author: L. Klindt

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009--Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: The Norton Antivirus 2009 has been pretty good. I have no complaints, it has been catching some possible intrusions. I would recommend this to someone, I am pleased with this purchase. It is an easy software to use and is very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Confident about Norton AntiVirus
customer_reviews.text: Have used Norton since becoming a home computer user (many years). User friendly. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok..
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. It does slow down computer a bit but otherwise it seems to keep virus away basically.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Towery

customer_reviews.title: Norton AV
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Norton AV since 1996. Would not use any other product. It has kept me very safe and sound for over 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B. Schanck

customer_reviews.title: 09 Anti-Virus
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install and I've found it is effective against virus detection. Price was excellent and so was shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Installed perfectly, works perfectly (1 month later), arrived on time, at 1/2 the instore or Norton price.
customer_reviews.author: Med Student Psychiatry

customer_reviews.title: Customer Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Norton is a reliable product and the best prices for this can be found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This program made my computer seize up and reboot. After several occurences of this nature, I uninstalled it and went with AVG.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Norton antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Norton Antivirus 2009 is a good production. It automaticly performs virus check, scan and protection for me and virus worry free. My cowork and I have been using Norton Antivirus for many years. It is great to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my dad's computer. It was fairly easy to install and seems to be working quite well so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent software that doesn't slow down your PC!
customer_reviews.text: Norton AV 2009 has been getting rave reviews, and with good reason. It is a much improved product over previous versions, and runs 'in the backround' without noticeably slowing down your PC while you're web surfing or performing other tasks. I have it running on my HP 'Mini' series 1035 netbook, and I have not noticed any slowdown in any computing tasks including Wi-Fi web surfing. If I truly wish to nitpick, I would ask that Symantec include a 'progress bar' and an 'elapsed time indicator' on it's scan display as an update or in future versions.
customer_reviews.author: CQ DX

customer_reviews.title: Better and better.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Norton for years, and it's been pretty good to me. However, I have to agree with old reviews that said it bogs the system down (but usually only for the first several minutes, then it would calm down). But I've been pleasantly surprised with this year's version. It is noticeably lighter on the resources. Uninstalling the previous version and installing the new one took awhile, but it went off without a hitch (on XP). As for the effectiveness, according to the AV test results on [...] it ranks with the best of them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pady

customer_reviews.title: Love Norton!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norton Antivirus for years. Back in the days of 386 processors I was using McAfee, but it slowed my computer down. I switched to Norton one day and never looked back. Live update works great keeping the software updated with the latest virus definitions and scanning algorithms. In times when I had no money, I would even forgo the subscription and do updates manually from Symantec's website. It's not well documented, but they are there. Now my only question is will Norton 2009 work with Windows 7 come October?
customer_reviews.author: Doit2it

customer_reviews.title: Norton 2009 with AntiSpyware
customer_reviews.text: I'm running XP pro with an older P4 processor and it seems to work fine. I was using Norton 2005 which seemed to use a lot more processing power. Though I wish it had more settings and the settings it does have are hard to find. I have to keep referring to the help file to find anything. I consider myself computer literate and can fix most problems with my computer myself. I would recommend this product at least for a system similar to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Vampyra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well on older computers.
customer_reviews.text: I tried Norton Anti-Virus 2009 on my older Compaq Presario from 2001, and I didn't work very well when I installed it. It slowed my startup time and it was pretty much a resource hog. I wouldn't recommend this software or any anti-virus software under $30.00. It's cheap, but beware. This almost screwed up my older computer. There is a lot of bugs in Norton Anti-Virus 2009. I would recommend avoiding buying this piece of junk, and stick to a better anti-virus program like CA Anti-Virus plus Anti-Spyware 2008 or PC Tools Spyware Doctor with Anti-Virus. AVG is good, too. Just say NO to Norton Anti-Virus 2009.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Norton and once again the 2009 version doesn't disappoint. I got it at a really reasonable price, much cheaper than Walmart, Best Buy and even Symantec's own website. My wife and I surf on alot of different websites and using Windows these days its so easy to get a virus or malware/spyware on your pc. I am happy to report that I have been using Norton since 2003 and have not had one bad incident. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As some others have mentioned, this version of Norton will not work with any non-Norton firewall. I had used Zonealarm (a free firewall program) along with Norton for many years...faithfully renewing and upgrading Norton each year. Now upon installing Norton 2009, Zonealarm was uninstalled and I have no firewall. By sneaking in this incompatibility, they have lost me as a customer. I still gave it 3 stars because, presumably, it still blocks viruses. But who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Lover

customer_reviews.title: New lightweight Norton!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the download version of this product. It works on Windows Vista and XP. The download was under 10 minutes. The interface is clean and easy to follow. It automatically cut off Windows Defender which some people may find annoying. It uses very little of system resources and has a graph on the interface you can use to monitor the resources. It scans incoming email. It's different from the Norton I remembered from 5 years ago which was bloated and slow. It's $39.99 for the download for one PC. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: veruca salt

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: This product performs exactly as the claims made on it. Very easy to setup and when I did encounter a problem the response time to solve it was great. I am quite pleased with Norton's 2009 Antvirus software. It pretty much does everything for you, so far I have not had to do anything except re-boot after a function as be completed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Norton Anti-virus
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is Norton. The industry standard as far as I am concerned. I have had only Norton since 2005 after a rather sad experience with McAfee. I was slightly miffed that I had to download a separate Norton Removal Tool, but it wasn't that big a deal. The only reason I took off one star was that the Removal Tool also deleted one of my drivers (my MP3 player), and I had to do some "work-around" to get it back up and going. Clint.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton C. Wigen

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed.... I have been a loyal AV user for years.... when I upgraded my computer it came with Vista. I installed Zone alarm no problem. When it came to Norton AV2009 it refused to install with ZA.... No where on the package or website did it mention this incompatibility!!!! Norton AV2008 worked fine under ZA.
customer_reviews.author: Mycroft

customer_reviews.title: Got a trojan!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of those fake antivirus trojans that wont leave you alone and Norton didnt even notice it was there! It had blocked several attempts from entering my computer but yesterday all of a sudden my computer was infected! Tried scanning but it didnt notice it was there! If Norton was a condom, I'd be itching right about now!
customer_reviews.author: WillWilson2

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was using CA Antivirus for the last year and decided to switch to Norton. The reason for the switch is that CA allowed spyware to infect my computer several times because of our family's visits to facebook and other comminutiy sites. I have been using Norton for the last 9 months and recently I have seen spyware cause problems that appear to be hardware problems. However, I donwloaded Spybot and it detected and removed several spyware trojans that Norton passed through. Norton also has this obnoxious update box that appears constantly when your subscription is about to run out. So, I think think Norton is no better thatn the other mainstream AV software suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Norton Anti Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: It's great!!! And so much cheaper than doing the download directly from Norton. As soon as I got the message that my subscription was about to expire I ordered it. Amazon's shipping is so fast that my software was here long before I had to have it. I highly recommend ordering your software from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: I really have mix emotions about this program. It has a big name, and I rather have it than not having an antivirus, or having a free version. Still my spyhunter have to remove 2 trojans while I was using it. In the other hand the price was great and the service fast. So I made a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Magda V

customer_reviews.title: The best Anti-Virus software
customer_reviews.text: I'm using Norton Anti-Virus since 1998, comparing with other products it's the best and the simplest and the most compatible with MS Windows editions. I've used other products at work such as NOD32, McAfee and OfficeScan, I'm writing this review after practical experience. Norton Anti-Virus is the easiest and best way to protect your PC against viruses, trojans, worms and attacking cookies.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Barakat

customer_reviews.title: I only bought the new program because....
customer_reviews.text: The fact of the matter is that it cost less to buy a new program than to "subscribe" for Norton Services for another year. I am glad I did because the new program is better or at least it seems to be better. I think the full scan runs faster and the protection is unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filled my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble at first in installing this product. With help from my son who is in the computer business we were able to complete the installation. For the price, this appears to be adequate for my home computer. If there is only one user to a computer, it is fine, if not, it would be advisable to select another Norton product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Silent Partner
customer_reviews.text: I feel comfortable knowing Norton Antivirus is protecting me but the main advantage is that I don't really realize it's there. I get very few notices and most of it's efforts are accomplished in the background with no apparent compromising of my activities. The only con is I have noticed web pages are loading slower but I don't know if that is my ISP, Vista, Norton, IE8 or some other unknown "enhancement".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it would solve my computer issues being so cheap, but was amazed that it removed all the virus' that none of my other methods were able to do. I am completely satified with this product and strongly recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: swalker630

customer_reviews.title: One of the best antivirus software
customer_reviews.text: Norton Antivirus 2009 is one of the best antivirus software. * stops viruses, spyware, bots, worms and malicious threats * great interface * good virus database * it works on Windows Vista and XP
customer_reviews.author: Georgia -

customer_reviews.title: Negatively affects Windows Explorer, even with patch
customer_reviews.text: After finally connecting with online help, upgraded to Norton AntiVirus 2009. After upgrading, context menues (right click) in Windows explorer frequently caused explorer to abort. Found patch on web to fix problem. Didn't work. After removing all Norton products, this problem disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: D. REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: necessary for my pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Antivirus for my son's pc. It was cheaper for me to buy it from Amazon, than to purchase it as an office warehouse store. I am pleased with my purchase & the price & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: nenny paige

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating experience, never again.
customer_reviews.text: Conflicted with my ZoneAlarm and caused my WinXP desktop to freeze repeatedly. Symantec said Norton Removal Tool had to be downloaded in order to uninstall, but this tool didn't work (nothing at all happened when I clicked). Contacted Symantec support via online chat, and techie eventually advised me to uninstall using Windows Control Panel, which I could have done myself without any help. Wasted more than four hours over two nights to get my box working again. At least Symantec allows user to mail in the installation CD for a refund by check, so hopefully all I've lost is time and cost of shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: Claude R

customer_reviews.title: Norton AntiVirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, as to be expected from a leader in AntiVirus technology. No complaints so far. The only problem I've encountered is during installation. During install, the software "asks" if you wish to electronically register your name, address, and such. It also keeps track of your product key and allows for fast lookup of all your information. The problem I have is I found no option NOT to register electronically. Some people may find this irritating (as do I). That is the only flaw I can speak of.
customer_reviews.author: One Two Three

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: The product protects my pc from viruses and spyware. It is easy to use and doesn't appear to slow down computer processing speed or interfere with most software I have loaded on the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Country Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: Norton Anti-Virus binds to your computer like a parasite. I tried to delete it to switch antiviruses and it wouldn't delete. Norton tech support knows this is an issue - they even have their own program called the norton software removal tool to purge this program from your computer. Even that didn't help me. Unless you want to use Norton forever, save yourself the reformat. A free option that is, in my experience, just as good at protecting your PC is AVG. Check it out.
customer_reviews.author: JasonDC

customer_reviews.title: Say Goodbye To Bloatware and Hello To Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: This product is MUCH improved over previous versions. It just works without getting in the way. Check my review history because with prior versions I was no fan. Now I am.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product!
customer_reviews.text: NAV 2009 is so much faster than previous versions. I can browse and shop online knowing my laptop is protected. I recommend this product to everyone. I use it on my game computer and it run smoth. I'll recomend this solution for everone, there is no better solution out there in the shop's.
customer_reviews.author: Pawan K Nachnani

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get an antivirus program for my dad's two computers. He lives in another state and I always maintain his computers when I visit (or over the phone if necessary). I feel much better now knowing his computers are protected!
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: The Best and easy to use Antivirus!
customer_reviews.text: Norton never fail me. It's easy to use and good for the price! To tell you the truth it work by it self...it take a minute to install and you don't even notice when it's working . When I start my computer, Norton start running before the computer set up my internet connections in other words I am protected before I click to go to the internet! jaja... not chance for malware to mess with my NORTON!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER GREAT NORTON PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: the price was right and the service was fast. I have used the Norton products for several years and found them an excellant fighter against viriuses.
customer_reviews.author: Merle J. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: MUCH improved product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Norton Antivirus before in previous years and didn't like it much. Didn't find it particularly user friendly. This 2009 version is vastly improved. It loaded very easily, and has run simply and very well. It alerts me when ever there is an attempted atack or I've tried downloading something that comtains a threat. I am very pleased with this. AND I'm very pleased with the price I paid from Amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: Ann A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Much improved product
customer_reviews.text: I was a NAV user and had decided to switch. It was a resource hog. But the description and an attractive price hooked me. Good thing - the 2009 version is much better. Easy to install and use, not in your face all the time and, as advertised, my computer runs much faster. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Best Product At This Price
customer_reviews.text: After considerable research, I found this product to be the best at this price. It should not be used for Spyware but just as an anti-virus software. very effective and good product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gautam De

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this Anti-Virus software is great, it does not slow down the system whatsoever! unlike the previous anti-virus software packages...would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jo

customer_reviews.title: norton 2009!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this last week. read some bad reviews about it, but being a norton customer for the last 7 years, i decided to get it again. anyone who had a problem installing this, or if their computer runs slow because of it, obviously has a piece of crap pc or hasnt reformatted that hard drive in years. this product runs great. no problems. any problems...by a dell.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: Lower than retail price
customer_reviews.text: Norton Antivirus 2009 is a straight-forward security software for your PC , not all the bells and whistles that are offered by Norton's other security software and things you really don't need and you pay a much higher price for these extras that you probably won't use . Amazon definitely had the lowest price for this item of any place I could find and they shipped it in record time . No problems and I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ward

customer_reviews.title: Norton anti virus
customer_reviews.text: Great program, I have been using Norton anti-virus for a very long time and it just gets better and better. This is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Western Man

customer_reviews.title: Performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by others and they were right. So far it has done what it is supposed to do. Very easy installation and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brown

customer_reviews.title: Norton AntiVirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily and runs great. Keeps my PC up-todate with virus definitions and regularly scheduled scans. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rp of NC

customer_reviews.title: Good pc protection
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norton anti-virus software for years. The 2009 version is one of the best ever. I have used other brands of antivirus software. This is the most trouble-free I have found. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Klein

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had Norton for the last 5 years. But now with this new 360, If you ask for tech support they'll charge you $75.00. It's pathetic to say they least!! Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great antivirus protection
customer_reviews.text: i love this product!!! It came in excellent condition! I am so very pleased with it. Christine Ascencio
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Norton Anti Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Amazon always gives a great price for Norton products. It's easy to install. I believe Norton is an out standing product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Pollner

customer_reviews.title: Best Internet Security Software
customer_reviews.text: Easy to download. I am notified before any website is able to access information or download anything to my PC. I would recommend this software.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.I.T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Norton is its own virus
customer_reviews.text: A year ago, I purchased, downloaded and installed Norton AV to protect a new computer. However, my wifi connection is so sketchy (I live in a pretty rural area) that Norton's constatnt downloading and updating and scanning made my internet unusable. PLUS it did NOT stop trojans. I de-installed it and installed other shareware that works unobtrusively. HOWEVER, a year later Norton AUTOMATICALLY RENEWED ITSELF, charging me without authorization. Trying to get this charge reversed, NORTON CHARGED ME to speak with a representative--and this is their DEFAULT FOR CUSTOMER SUPPORT. They CHARGE YOU for EVERYTHING. BEWARE! Look around the web for other programs, Norton and Symantec are completely evil.
customer_reviews.author: Smarty Pants

customer_reviews.title: norton antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: product is adequate for its mission. Adds interminable time to start-up sequence on a PC.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Software
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. I have not had any issues with it. The only thing that I may have done differently after purchasing this product was to upgrade to the "Internet Security" version from Norton. However, I have not had any problems that would deem the more advanced version of the software is necessary yet.
customer_reviews.author: aggietn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by computer technician
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by the tech who had to come to my house to remove a virus. I had McAfee virus protection which obviously didn't work, and I was days on the phone trying to get ahold of them to fix the problem. Long, awful story. Ended up calling tech to come to house who fixed the problem and recommended Norton. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Good Service
customer_reviews.text: Was great to see such a good price on an item I really needed. I ordered 2 and gave one of them to a friend who also needed one and still paid less than I would have paid for one shopping locally. Love the fact that there is no shipping and handling fees on purchases over 25.00. You can bet I will check all the gold box values everyday. Amazon you do a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne LaPuglia

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Software is excellent and much more user freindly than previous versions. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Marzano

customer_reviews.title: Norton Rules!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got Norton Antivirus 2009 it cured whatever depression my computer was going through.
customer_reviews.author: adrians amAz on

customer_reviews.title: "goodbuy"  virus
customer_reviews.text: I've installed the program and I still , once in a while, receive messages from Spyware doctor that my computer is infected.. I hope it's just a form of making you scared to buy another product and not that your PC is really or is still infected. I din't notice any kind of infection as before installing this program. I've always loved Norton.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Marins

customer_reviews.title: Good price on virus protector
customer_reviews.text: I am using this virus protector on my computer and it is working very well. Good price and fast shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Meek

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product at a great price. I will buy it next year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Amend

customer_reviews.title: Bad costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought Norton to protect my computer, but decided to unistall it after some problems. The removal tool deleted all my personal files as well as Norton. I decided to contact Norton hoping to get some help, but their answer was that since the program has been removed, I can not claim any responsibility on Norton???....It took me 2 hours to convince them that their software caused the damage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Haeberle

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great value
customer_reviews.text: Install was flawless and quick on Vista operating system. Had McAfee pre-installed when computer was purchased and was having frequent issues such as "no longer protected" alerts resulting in requiring action to re-store virus protection. Have had no issues to date with Norton.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Major hassles associated with  the installation.
customer_reviews.text: I also installed Norton Antivirus 2009 alongside Zone Alarm firewall and my system froze. Upon installation, Norton Antivirus 2009 directs the user--without explanation--to uninstall Zone Alarm but also offers the option to skip this step (without advising of why Zone Alarm should be uninstalled nor what the consequences of skipping the uninstall of Zone Alarm might be). I have freed up the system by disabling and later uninstalling Zone Alarm however I am none too pleased with Symantec. So how does the new version of Norton Antivirus work compared to the previous version? I have no idea. Any potential improvements were upstaged by the hassles associated with installing it.
customer_reviews.author: El Mirón

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This version of Norton has finally gotten rid of all the things that slowed down my computer in the past and had me leave Norton. It does an idle time scan which means that it never needs to take a big block of time when I might want to use the computer, to do the scan. Well done Norton.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Conflicts with existing software
customer_reviews.text: Only after buying this do you find out that you can't use it with your existing firewall. You have to uninstall your firewall AND not reinstall any other firewall except Norton. A simple warning on the box saying DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU USE A FIREWALL would save people alot of people alot of hassle but I guess it would end up costing Norton alot of sales too.
customer_reviews.author: DR Smith

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus works very well on my computer.
customer_reviews.text: Norton antivirus is good and safe to be used. It works well on my computer. This is the second time I purchase Norton Antivirus. I have it on both my laptop and my desk computer and in both cases it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Manal El Saati

customer_reviews.title: norton antivirus
customer_reviews.text: I have installed with product with little ease. It has worked for me quickly as well as efficiently. I had another product installed and removed it because it did not perform as well as I would like. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better Mcafee. The last 2 McAfees I used were a disaster to install. Norton installs very easy and has great help if you cannot uininstall the old version. I'm sold and will use it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Still the One
customer_reviews.text: Experience and my local techie tell me that Norton Antivirus is still the one for online protection. The same goes for Amazon for another trouble-free bargain, this time for upkeep of an older system destined for support in graphics and writing.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. WHITENER

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my machine
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install this on my Windows XP SP3 machine, but it would freeze the machine when services started. Norton tech support tried to fix the problem but couldn't. I experienced the same problem with Norton 360 v3.0.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Norton 2009
customer_reviews.text: You have to have some antivirus program on your computer. There are some good free antivirus programs but I prefer to have something more stable. Although, Norton has been known to cause problems occasionally, I prefer it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Pald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Anti-Virus CD in record time and it was very easy to install. Thank you for having it and for it being so resonably priced. Thank you, Jane Wood
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2009
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need for your computer. This was recommended to me by my internet provider. In one of the big box stores it was priced 39.99 and through Amazon I picked it up new for 25.99. A big savings!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Norton Anti Virus 2009 is easy to install and dependable in scanning your computer on a regular basis. This is my 10th year in using the product and every year it has a few more features.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gronso

customer_reviews.title: No to Norton
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I installed Norton Anti Virus 2009, my computer started to freeze up and do weird things. I had to uninstall it. I subsequently got CA Internet Security Suite and everything runs fine. Since this experience, I've spoken with a few other people who have had the same experience. Norton is no longer what it used to be. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dolce Allegra

product_meta.title: Norton Antivirus 2009 [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Nowadays, it's absolutely necessary to protect your PC against viruses. Norton Antivirus 2009 is strong on protection and light on system resources, so you'll be protected without dealing with hang-ups on your computer. This version offers 1-Year Protection. 

Blocks browser exploits and protects against infected web sites Installs in under one minute and requires less than 8 MB of memory on average Recovery tool boots and repairs badly infected PCs Delivers a complete, deep cleaning scan Norton On-going Protection provides continuous protection updates and new product features as they become available throughout your product subscription period Norton Automatic Renewal Service helps to ensure that you're protected by automatically renewing your product subscription before it expires Automatically schedules scans and updates to occur while PC is idle Silent mode - Helps ensure movies and games are not interrupted Maps your wireless home network Free Technical Support Tech support from Symantec 1-Year ProtectionMinimum System Requirements Microsoft Windows Vista Home Basic/Home Premium/Business/Ultimate Microsoft Windows XP with Service Pack 2 Home/XP Pro/XP Media Center Edition 300 MHz or higher processor 256 MB of RAM Minimum 150 MB of available hard disk space Email scanning supported for POP3- and SMTP-compatible email clients Browser support for Browser Protection features - Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 (32-bit only) and later, Mozilla Firefox 2.0 and later Supported instant messenger clients - AOL, Yahoo!, Microsoft, Trillian

AMAZON.COM
Norton AntiVirus 2009 is the fastest, lightest antivirus solution you can buy. Rapid pulse updates and the innovative new Norton Insight architecture dramatically improve performance while helping to ensure that you're protected from the latest threats. Norton AntiVirus stays out of your way while you work or play. It automatically suspends all non-critical tasks and alerts when you're enjoying games and movies. And while Web-based attacks may be the single fastest growing type of online threat, Symantec's patent-pending Browser Protection lets you surf the Internet with confidence.

Norton AntiVirus 2009 is the fastest, lightest antivirus solution you can buy. Click to enlarge. 

WINNING PROTECTION AGAINST VIRUSES, SPYWARE, AND OTHER SOFTWARE THREATS
Engineered for Speed


 * New--Scans only files and processes at risk using Norton Insight. 
 * New--Installs in under one minute on average, requires less than 8 MB of memory. 

Up-to-the-minute Protection


 * New--Delivers up-to-the-minute protection with rapid pulse updates every 5 to 15 minutes. 
 * Improved--Provides multilayered security through the Norton Protection System. 
 * New--Prevents bots from taking control of your PC. 
 * Detects and automatically removes malicious threats. 
 * Improved--Defends against Web-based attacks. 
 * Automatically detects and removes spyware, viruses, Trojans, bots and Internet worms. 
 * New--Recovery tool boots and repairs badly infected PCs. 
 * New--Delivers our most complete, deep cleaning scan possible. 
 * Norton Ongoing Protection provides continuous protection updates and new product features as they become available throughout your product subscription period, helping to keep your computer protected against the latest Internet threats and risks. 
 * Norton Automatic Renewal Service helps to ensure that you're protected by automatically renewing your product subscription before it expires. 

Control without disruptions


 * New--Automatically schedules scans and updates to occur while PC is idle. 
 * New--Review the security status of every process on your PC. 
 * New--Silent mode helps ensures movies and games are never interrupted. 
 * Maps your wireless home network. 

Free Technical Support


 * New--Tech support without charge from Symantec delivers help however you need it.*** 

WHAT'S NEW?
Botnet Detection


 * Prevents bots from taking control of your PC, accessing your private information, or using your computer to host an attack. 

Browser Protection


 * Blocks browser exploits and protects against infected Web sites so users can surf the Internet with confidence 

Rapid Pulse Updates


 * Delivers up-to-the-minute protection with updates every 5 to 15 minutes 

Norton Insight


 * Saves time and improves performance with Norton Insight which delivers innovative intelligence-driven technology for faster, fewer and shorter scans 
 * Reviews the security status of every process on your PC 

Norton Recovery Tool


 * Boots and repairs PCs badly infected by malware, even when the virus has left leaving the computer unbootable 

Norton Protection System


 * Provides multilayered protection working in concert to stop threats before they impact you 

Control without Disruptions


 * Ensures movies and games are never interrupted via silent mode which suspends alerts and updates while you're watching or playing 
 * Smart Scheduler runs quietly in the background to let you work and play without disruption 

Technology Improvements


 * Real-time SONAR (Symantec Online Network for Advanced Response) technology detects new and unknown threats 
 * Streamlined, rapid installation gets you up and running fast 
 * Specialized deep-cleaning technology delivers our most complete scan possible to repair heavily infected computers 

Virus and Spyware Protection


 * Automatically detects and removes spyware, viruses, Trojan horses, and Internet worms 
 * Monitors email and instant messages so you can exchange files without exchanging threats 
 * Rootkit detection finds and removes threats that are hidden deeply in the operating system. 
 * Norton On-going Protection provides continuous protection updates and new product features as they become available throughout your product subscription period, helping to keep your computer protected against new threats and risks.* 
 * Norton Automatic Renewal Service helps ensure that you're protected by automatically renewing your product subscription before it expires. 
 * Includes protection updates and new product features as available throughout the renewable service period. * Includes one year of automatic definition updates, new product features, and access to updated versions of Norton AntiVirus. * 

* 1 Year Protection: With this service, you receive the right to use this product on one PC or on the specified number of PCs during the service period, which begins upon initial installation. This renewable service includes protection updates and new product features as available throughout the service period, subject to acceptance of the Symantec License Agreement included with this product and available for review at www.symantec.com. WHICH NORTON SOLUTION IS RIGHT FOR ME?
feature_bullets: Norton AntiVirus stops viruses, worms, spyware, bots, and more keeps your system protected against all types of malicious threats
Norton Insight delivers innovative intelligence driven technology for faster, fewer, shorter scans
Rapid pulse updates every 5 to 15 minutes provide up to the minute protection
Prevents virus infected emails and instant messages from spreading feel secure while you keep in touch
Blocks browser exploits and protects against infected Web sites surf the Internet with confidence
